title: India Gate
description: India Gate is a war memorial located in New Delhi, along with Rajpath. It is dedicated to the 82,0000 soldiers, both Indian and British.

title: Red Fort
description: The Red Fort is a historical fort in the old Delhi area, on the banks of Yamuna.

title: Qutub Minar
description: Qutub Minar is a minaret or a victory tower located in the Qutub complex, a UNESCO World Heritage Site in Delhi's Mehrauli area.

title: Lotus Temple
description: Located in the national capital of New Delhi, the Lotus Temple is an edifice dedicated to the Bahá'í Faith.

title: Humayun's Tomb
description: Humayun's Tomb is the final resting place of Mughal Emperor Humayun.
